home_description: A cross-platform desktop toolbox designed to provide you with an efficient and convenient workflow.
subtitle_tool_description: AI translation, format conversion, and other subtitle processing features.
rename_tool_description: Easily rename multiple files in bulk.
music_tool_description: Convert paid music to FLAC/MP3 format.
cross_platform_description: Built with Electron, supporting Windows, macOS, and Linux with a consistent native experience.
feature_fast_description: Optimized architecture and efficient processing pipelines, delivering blazing-fast performance and responsiveness.
feature_secure_description: All data is processed locally without uploading to the cloud, ensuring your privacy and security.
